com.pega.pegarules.pub.util

Interface PDFUtils


  • public interface PDFUtils
    Utilities for PDF generation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CLEARCACHE
      isClearCache: enable clearing the conversion cache
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CUSTOM_CSS
      customCss: This will override all the css included in the markup
      static java.lang.String PARAM_DISABLE_XHTML
      disableXHTML : optional parameter to disable XHTML while pre processing HTML with tidy
      static java.lang.String PARAM_DOCUMENT_VIEW_MODE
      PARAM_DOCUMENT_VIEW_MODE: optional parameter to set the viewmode - https://pd4ml.com/javadoc/com/pd4ml/Constants.html#PD4ML_DOCUMENT_VIEW_MODE
      static java.lang.String PARAM_DONOT_ADJUST_HTML_WIDTH
      sets htmlWidth to the most right margin of the HTML block content
      static java.lang.String PARAM_EDITABLE_PDF
      pyEditablePDF - flag for generating the editable pdf
      static java.lang.String PARAM_EMBEDFONT
      pyPDFEmbedFont: true/false.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_ENABLEHYPERLINKS
      pyPDFEnableHyperlinks: true/false.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_ENABLESMARTTABLEBREAKS
      pyEnableSmartTableBreaks: enable smart table breaks
      static java.lang.String PARAM_FONTSDIR
      pyPDFFontsDirectory: The fonts directory
      static java.lang.String PARAM_FOOTERHTML
      pyPDFFooterHTMLTemplate: optional HTML template for footer in PDF
      static java.lang.String PARAM_GENTOOLTIPS
      pyGenerateToolTips: generate tooltips from title attributes of the markup
      static java.lang.String PARAM_HALT_ERR
      HaltOnHTMLError: throw exception if we detect an error during html processing using tidy
      static java.lang.String PARAM_HALT_WARN
      HaltOnHTMLWarning: throw an exception if we detect a warning during html processing using tidy
      static java.lang.String PARAM_HEADERHTML
      pyPDFHeaderHTMLTemplate: optional HTML template for header in PDF
      static java.lang.String PARAM_HTML_WIDTH
      html width: affects HTML-To-PDF scale factor.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_HTMLDISABLEPROCESSING
      pyHTMLDisableProcessing: true/false.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_KEEP_MS_TAGS
      keepMsTags : optional parameter to keep MS tags while pre processing HTML with tidy
      static java.lang.String PARAM_KEEP_XML_ELEMENTS
      keepXMLElements : optional parameter to keep XML elements while pre processing HTML with tidy
      static java.lang.String PARAM_KEEPPROPS
      pyKeepPropsFile: optionally keep pd4ml properties after processing.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MARGIN_BOTTOM
      pyMarginBottom : optional parameter to set left margin.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MARGIN_LEFT
      pyMarginLeft : optional parameter to set left margin.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MARGIN_RIGHT
      pyMarginRight : optional parameter to set left margin.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MARGIN_TOP
      pyMarginTop : optional parameter to set left margin.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_MEDIA_ENABLE_SCREEN
      MediaScreenDisable : this enables media screen css along with media print css
      static java.lang.String PARAM_ORIENTATION
      pyPDFPageOrientation : landscape/portrait default is landscape
      static java.lang.String PARAM_OUTLINES
      pyEnableOutlines: enable support for PDF Bookmarks and Outlines
      static java.lang.String PARAM_PAGESIZE
      pyPDFPageSize :A4/LETTER/LEGAL default is A4
      static java.lang.String PARAM_PDF_FORMAT
      pyPDFFormat :PDF/PDFA/PDFUA.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_PDFA
      pyPDFGeneratePDFA: true/false.
      static java.lang.String PARAM_PROPSDIR
      pyPDFPropsDirectory: optional directory for pd4ml properties file
      static java.lang.String PARAM_SHOWWARNING
      pyShowTidyWarnings : optionally show tidy warning while processing
      static java.lang.String PARAM_SKIP_EXTERNAL_RESOURCE
      PARAM_SKIP_EXTERNAL_RESOURCE: Boolean value to determine if external content should be fetched
      static java.lang.String PARAM_START_PAGE
      startPage: starting number (offset) for page numbering
      static java.lang.String PARAM_TIMEOUT_FOR_EXTERNAL_CONTENT
      PARAM_TIMEOUT_FOR_EXTERNAL_CONTENT: Time out value to fetch external content
      static java.lang.String VERSION 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] generatePDF(java.lang.String htmlStream)
      Returns an byte array using the export data
      byte[] generatePDF(java.lang.String htmlStream, ParameterPage parameters)
      Generates the PDF given the HTML Stream and formatting options Formatting options are declared as constants with the "PARAM_" prefix in this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePDF

        byte[] generatePDF(java.lang.String htmlStream)
        Returns an byte array using the export data
        Parameters:
        htmlStream -
        Returns:
        byte array[]

      • generatePDF

        byte[] generatePDF(java.lang.String htmlStream,
                   ParameterPage parameters)
        Generates the PDF given the HTML Stream and formatting options Formatting options are declared as constants with the "PARAM_" prefix in this interface. Some example constants are: PARAM_ORIENTATION, PARAM_PAGESIZE
        Parameters:
        htmlStream - the html stream
        parameters - for rendering options
        Returns:
        a byte array containing the PDF data
